title: MZS: New York
description: McLean Davis's boyfriend cheated on her and that's not the worst thing to happen this weekend. Zombies have taken over New York. At 22,000 words this the second novella in the Metropolitan Zombie Survivor series. McLean just found out that her boyfriend of a year was cheating on her and considered her trash. Instead of crawling into a chic-flick and ice cream induced stupor she hits the bottle, hard. When she sobers up McLean learns that a lot more has gone wrong in the world, zombies have infested every major metropolitan area, including Manhattan. After a desperate dial through her contact list she connects with Patrick McCann from her mistake year in Colorado and a fellow survivor. The survivors join forces and face the horrors of a city overrun by hungry undead. Zombies have taken over New York, and every other city on the planet.
author: K.D. McAdams
